    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.LFLanguageUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>It provides language utility functions for the Localization Framework.</description>
        <name>LFLanguageUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var LFLanguageUtils = Class.create();
LFLanguageUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getLanguageDetails: function(targetLanguageCodes) {
        var languageDetails = {};
        targetLanguageCodes = targetLanguageCodes || [];
        var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_language");
        if (targetLanguageCodes.length > 0) {
            gr.addQuery("id", "IN", targetLanguageCodes);
        } else {
            gr.addActiveQuery();
        }
        gr.orderBy("name");
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            languageDetails[gr.getUniqueValue()] = {
                "name": gs.getMessage(gr.getValue("name")),
                "code": gr.getValue("id")
            };
        }
        return languageDetails;
    },

    type: "LFLanguageUtils"
};]]></script>
